A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a standalone movie it was good. The story was good\,  as was the acting and production value.  But as a star wars film it was not good. \nThey really Twisted and bent the canon up\,  especially the parts about the force. So it's definitely going in a new direction which I'm not too happy about. But if the film was a standalone sci fi flick I think it would habe been better received.
